## Context7 MCP server

In VS Code, the Context7 MCP server needs to be invoked explicitly with `#context7` in the prompts.

## GitHub MCP server

In VS Code, the GitHub MCP server needs to be invoked explicitly with `#github` in the prompts.
Use the MCP server in `Agent` mode and NOT `Ask` mode.

When installed at user level, the GitHub MCP server is available under the name `github/github-mcp-server`.<br>
`~/Library/Application Support/Code/User/mcp.json` on macOS
